title: LastMinutePreparation (LMP)
tagline: Study what matters. Right before the exam.
description: AI-powered CBSE last-minute exam preparation platform focused on high-probability questions and exam-oriented revision.

what.description: LastMinutePreparation is a production-grade, AI-powered exam preparation platform built for Class 10th and 12th CBSE students. It focuses on last-minute revision using extremely high-probability questions, last-night-before-exam tools, and structured chapter-wise guidance.

reflection.title: What I Learned / Challenges
reflection.description: Gained hands-on experience building a real-world EdTech product with AI-heavy workloads. Learned to handle concurrent requests using Inngest queues, improve performance using Redis caching, integrate Razorpay payments, and design an exam-focused UX that converts free users into paying customers.

why.description: I built LastMinutePreparation to solve last-minute exam panic by helping students focus only on what actually comes in CBSE board exams. The goal was to replace information overload with confidence-driven, exam-relevant preparation.

problem.description: The platform helps students avoid wasting time on low-impact topics by highlighting extremely high-probability questions, structured revision sheets, and instant AI-powered explanations. It simplifies revision during the most critical exam period.

features: Extreme high-probability questions (10+ times repeated in CBSE board exams)
Chapter-wise topper-style answers in proper board format
Last Night Before Exam revision mode
Previous Year Questions (2014–2025) with clear solutions
AI Topic Summarizer for fast concept understanding
Ask Any Question with instant AI responses
Chat with PDF (turn notes into an interactive teacher)
Chapter-wise study guides
Quiz, Fill Ups, and True/False practice generator
Diagram & Image Analysis with topper-style explanations
Usage-based freemium model with request limits
Queue-based AI request handling using Inngest
Redis caching for faster responses and cost optimization
Secure payment integration using Razorpay
SEO-optimized pages for organic growth
Fully deployed on Render (backend) and Vercel (frontend)

title: TalkSphere - The Chat App
description: Real-time full-stack chat app with messaging, groups, media sharing, and friend requests — built for speed and scalability.

what.description: TalkSphere is a full-stack, production-grade chat application that enables real-time conversations with file sharing, group management, and friend request systems. It leverages WebSockets for instant updates, role-based access for group control, and efficient backend design for performance and scalability.

reflection.title: What I Learned / Challenges
reflection.description: Built expertise in implementing bi-directional communication with Socket.io, managing large-scale state with Redux Toolkit, and optimizing MongoDB queries for real-time performance. Learned to design scalable backend architecture and handle complex group features like member addition/removal and admin control without breaking synchronization.

why.description: I developed TalkSphere to master real-time application architecture, WebSocket communication, and system design for chat-based platforms. It allowed me to explore efficient data flow, event-driven updates, and how production apps handle concurrency and scalability at scale.

problem.description: TalkSphere simplifies modern communication by offering real-time one-on-one and group chat functionalities, complete with media sharing, role management, and instant notifications. It eliminates delays and synchronization issues common in traditional chat systems, providing a fast, interactive user experience.

features: User authentication with JWT and secure sessions
Real-time messaging using Socket.io
Group creation, editing, and deletion with admin privileges
Add or remove group members dynamically
Send and receive images, videos, documents, and audio files
Friend request system with accept/reject workflow
Real-time dashboard with active users and message stats
Cloud storage integration via Cloudinary
Optimized backend using Prisma ORM and MongoDB
Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and ShadCN components
Fully deployed on Render (backend) and Vercel (frontend)

title: Arogya - Doctor Appointment
description: Arogya is a telemedicine app for booking appointments and consulting doctors via secure video calls, with role-based access.

what.description: Arogya is a doctor consultation app with appointment booking, video calls, and role-based access for admins, doctors, and patients.

why.description: To create a remote healthcare platform that’s easy to use, scalable, and improves doctor-patient access across regions.

problem.description: It makes healthcare accessible from anywhere, saving time and effort for both doctors and patients.

reflection.title: What I Learned / Challenges
reflection.description: Learned video API integration, secure auth, credit systems, and building responsive, role-based platforms.

features: Role-based access (Admin, Doctor, Patient)
Video consultation via WebRTC (OpenTok)
Freemium model with credit usage
Doctor scheduling
Patient appointment booking
Admin dashboard
Email/in-app notifications
JWT authentication
Health history tracking
Responsive mobile-friendly UI
